function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive impact criteria in building domains may lead to increased human traffic and interaction, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission due to increased human traffic and interaction in positively-impacted building domains, leading to potential disease spread.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to control and limit human traffic, enhance ventilation and air filtration systems, and promote personal hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, occupancy monitoring technology, touchless fixtures, UV disinfection technology.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building management, facility management, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Low scores in electricity, domestic hot water, and dynamic envelope domains may lead to compromised living conditions, increasing the risk of illness and disease.","Impact":"Compromised living conditions due to low scores in critical domains, leading to an increased risk of illness and disease among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Upgrade electrical systems, improve hot water supply, enhance insulation in the building envelope, and implement energy-efficient heating and cooling systems.","Technologies":"Solar panels, energy-efficient HVAC systems, smart hot water heaters, insulation materials.","People":"Building occupants and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building management, facility management, and maintenance personnel."}]}
